components/search-form:
{{{snippet 'forms_search'}}}
<form class="search-form" action="{{urls.search}}">
  <label class="search-label">
    <svg class="icon-search">
      <use xlink:href="#icon-search"></use>
    </svg>
    <input class="search-input" name="search_query" placeholder="{{lang 'header.search'}}" type="text">
  </label>
</form>
